message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the product's value is quite high. How about we meet at $170?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for it. Can we meet at this price?
